article_title: How Would A President Ben Carson Overturn Roe v. Wade?

article_metadata.description: Before going through the legal mechanics, the first thing to recognize is that Roe isn’t even the governing legal precedent regarding abortion—and hasn’t been for over two decades.
article_metadata.author: Ilya Shapiro
